overview:
Chief Information Security Officer

Mr. Bruno is a technically sophisticated and certified Security Management Executive focusing on Technology Convergence, Digital Asset Management & Protection, Digital Media Distribution, Identity & Access Management, and Physical Security. Mr. Bruno has more than 20 years experience working extensively in information technology, and is an expert in cyber security and systems integration. He is talented in building teams, proactively identifying and resolving problems, and managing operations. Mr. Bruno holds a bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering from California State University-Northridge. Notable Professional Licenses/Certifications:(CISSP) (CISM) (CGEIT) (IAM) (CCNA) (SCSE) (NCSP) and (SCTS).
